job_title: Works Planner in Saint Helens, South East England, England
pros: All office staff are on Flexi time, but the time off is limited. You are given a great range of benefits which are things like health plans, life insurance and discount schemes. They also offer in house courses to develop your skills to benefit your career. Also Helena aren't a company who cut corners and make you feel unwanted. Everyone's opinion counts and no matter who you speak to loves working for Helena.
cons: My team are the worst off out of the company as we are the only staff who are able to deal with operatives on the system. We are very restricted to holidays as we can get a continuous cover to help when other planners are off, if more than 1 one person is off there is a lot of pressure put onto the team.
